---
title: "Middle game cube benchmark"
author: "Lasse Hjorth Madsen"
date: today

::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


## Why this?

This is a collection of positions that are solid double/takes, all from the early middle game (here defined as move number 12 at the most, counting both sides). The intention is to help establish a feel for how good doubles and good takes look like for this common class of positions.

For all positions, I present the main one which is a clear double/take, meaning that both not doubling and passing would be at least a 0.07` error.

All positions are taken from a collection of my online matches at [Backgammon Galaxy](play.backgammongalaxy.com).

## Double/take positions



## Position  1![](middle-game-cubes_files/figure-html/checker-1.png){width=672}

    Cube analysis
    4-ply cubeless equity +0.508 (Money: +0.523)
      0.648 0.293 0.018 - 0.352 0.081 0.004
    Cubeful equities:
    1. Double, take        +0.841
    2. Double, pass        +1.000  (+0.159)
    3. No double           +0.731  (-0.110)
    Proper cube action: Double, take

    XGID=-b----E-C-A-eD---a-cb--bAA:0:0:-1:41:0:0:0:5:10
